name: Disciples of Steel: Chronicles of CyHagan
name_original: Disciples of Steel: Chronicles of CyHagan
description:
Disciples of Steel: Chronicles of CyHagan is a RPG game developed by MegaSoft Entertainment. It was originally released in 1993. It was published by MegaSoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Disciples of Steel: Chronicles of CyHagan is available on PC.
